document_data.name: Gingu
document_data.mainbody: '''Gingu''' was a fruit-bearing species of [[tree]] native to the [[Malatran Plateau]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Habitats: Gingu fruits grew in abundance surrounding a scenic waterfall in the jungles not far from the [[saru]] village that fell victim to a strange wasting curse in the Year of Discovery. Gingu grew around other trees that bore edible fruit, such as [[coconut]] and [[banana]] [[palm]]s.
